duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist patients with daily activities, such as feeding, ambulating, grooming, and toileting.
Educate patients and their families under the delegation of a professional care provider.
Collect and document data related to patient care activities.
Provide a clean and safe patient care environment, companion care, and housekeeping.
Communicate with hospital staff, physicians, patients, and visitors.
Process paper and electronic orders for medical treatments, tests, appointments, and patient records.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED (CNA certification preferred)
